Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Houston in 1969...
Injured on 9/5/1971 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 4/1/1972 (Going to HOU: P J. Maloney, 3B T. Perez, 1B L. May. Going to CIN: P J. Denny, P F. Cambria, 1B H. Kato, P R. Corbin, RF T. Armas Sr.)...
Injured on 8/22/1972 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 5/28/1973, off Jim Hardin (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/1/1973, off Rich Gossage (CHC)...
Injured on 5/10/1975 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/15/1975 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
